title: [安全|管理] NOPE AntiCheat —— 高版本开源反作弊插件[1.15]
author: CpVgev_eCyIaZCO
txt_content:
本帖最后由 CpVgev_eCyIaZCO 于 2020-5-14 21:11 编辑 
Source Code(开源地址) :https://github.com/MSWS/AntiCheat
Donation Link(赞助地址) :
http://paypal.me/officialmsws
英俊的作者的SpigotMC主页
请在GitHub反馈BUG 问题 误判，而不是评论区一款能阻止各种黑客客户端作弊的新颖反作弊插件！(汉化ing)
特色60+ 自定义“检测项”GUI - GUI管理，查看和编辑"检测项&统计数据"记分板 - 简单有效率地显示玩家的VLs在记分板上BungeeCord支持 - NOPE 可同步 VLs，警告信息和跨Bungee命令全自动 - NOPE的默认配置将自动管理和记录所有惩罚hacker的操作高度配置化 - 管理，开关"检测项"，通过编辑配置文件让NOPE更好地运作剪贴板记录支持(? - 自动上传你的日志文件到剪贴板Banwaves - 自定义 Ban Wave

安装
将NOPE.jar插件丢进你的plugins目录
将ProtocolLib也丢进你的plugins目录
开启服务器
给管理人员nope.message.normal 权限接收调试信息(既监视玩家不合法操作)配置适合你的config.yml
检测项
Combat (12) Hacks related to combat
Reach 1
KillAura 4
AntiKB 1
FastBow 1
HighCPS 3
AutoClicker 1
AutoArmor 1

Movement (28) Hacks that affect server movement
Speed 3
NoSlowDown 5
InventoryMove 1
AutoWalk 1
Flight 6
Step 1
NoWeb 1
ClonedMovements 1
FastClimb 1
SafeWalk 1
FastSneak 1
Jesus 1
BHop 1
Spider 1
AntiAFK 1
AntiRotate 1
Glide 1

Render (4) Hacks that affect either client or server renders
SkinBlinker 1
InvalidMovement 1
Spinbot 1
AutoSneak 1

Player (9) Hacks that affect only the player
ChestStealer 1
Zoot 1
SelfHarm 1
GhostHand 1
FastEat 1
NoFall 1
AutoTool 2
AntiFire 1

World (6) Hacks that affect the world or blocks
IllegalBlockPlace 1
Scaffold 3
FastBreak 1
IllegalBlockBreak 1

Tick (2) Hacks related with packets/ticks
Timer 2

Total Checks: 61

命令权限
nope.command.[command] - /nope [command]
nope.command.banwave.addplayer - /nope banwave [Player]
nope.command.bypass.[category] - 绕过一系列检测项 (Movement, Player, Render, etc.)
nope.bypass.[hack] - 绕过特定检测项 (Flight, Speed, etc.)
nope.bypass.[category].[debugname] - 绕过特定检测项某方案(nope.bypass.flight.flight#1 etc.)
nope.scoreboard - 可视记分板
nope.command.toggle.[Setting] -开关特定功能 (或自己的记分板显示) (Dev, Pastebin, Scoreboard, etc.)
nope.message.normal - 监视作弊玩家
nope.message.dev - 接收dev信息(if dev mode is enabled)
nope.message.banwave - 接收玩家被Ban信息
nope.message.update - 接收插件更新信息.

默认配置
# ----------------------------------------------------------
#
#               NOPE Anti-Cheat Configuration
#
#   This is the configuration for NOPE. I recommend keeping
#    the default values unless you know what you're doing.
#
# ----------------------------------------------------------

#               -------------------------------
#                     Global Configuration
#               -------------------------------

Global: true # If disabled, NOPE will be disabled
# Whether or not to teleport the player back when they're flagged
SetBack: true
Scoreboard: false
Log: true
UpdateChecker:
  Enabled: true
  InGame: true

#               -------------------------------
#                     Banwave Configuration
#               -------------------------------

VlForInstaBan: 1500 # Minimum VL required for instant ban
VlForBanwave: 1000 # Minimum VL required to be queued for banwave
BanwaveRate: 36000 # Rate of banwave (in ticks)

#               -------------------------------
#                  Notification Configuration
#       Make sure staff members have nope.message.normal
#               -------------------------------

Minimum: 20 #Minimum VL to notify staff members
SecondsMinimum: 5000 #Cooldown of hack messages to prevent spam

# Each new color is a new level, this is based off percentage to VL for instant ban
# More colors = more notifications
VlColors: 
- '&a'
- '&e'
- '&6'
- '&c'
- '&4'

# If enabled, developer messages will be sent to the player and commands will not execute
DevMode: false 
DebugMode: false

CommandsForBan:
- kick %player% Hacking (%hack%) (%token%)
- say %player% was banned for %hack% (%token%)

CommandsForBanwave:
- kick %player% Hacking - Banwave (%hack%) (%token%)
- say %player% was banwaved for %hack% (%token%)

#               -------------------------------
#                     Check Configuration
#       Here you can configure which checks are/aren't enabled
#         You can also toggle these ingame with /nope stats
#   make sure to restart your server after modifying these settings
#               -------------------------------

Checks:
  Movement:
    Enabled: true
    Flight:
      Enabled: true
